name: Zavo
long_description:
Zavo is the first AI-native platform for in-person commerce.

We unify payments, point of sale, and AI agents into one seamless platform, giving every restaurant and retail business its own Ai workforce.

We started Zavo in May 2025, currently over 400 businesses of different sizes use Zavo to accept payments and manage operations

The future of in-person commerce is autonomous, and Zavo is building it.
one_liner: Agentic Point of Sale for restaurants and retail.
